title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 146.6 - Approval of training programs and qualifications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 146.6 - Approval of training programs and qualifications

State Regulations
(a) The UCS ADR office, with
the approval of the chief administrative judge and the four presiding justices
of the Appellate Divisions, shall adopt such criteria as may be appropriate for
the approval of training programs under these guidelines and for defining
recent experience mediating actual cases pursuant to section
146.4
(b) of this

Part. (b) The UCS
ADR office, with the approval of the chief administrative judge, may increase
the qualifications and training requirements in specific court ADR
programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
146.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
